verses.verse: In the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H4428>King<s%> Uzziah's <S%H4194>death,<s%> I <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3427>sitting<s%> on a <S%H3678>throne,<s%> <S%H7311>lofty<s%> and <S%H5375>exalted,<s%> with the <S%H7757>train<s%> of His <S%H7757>robe<s%> <S%H4390>filling<s%> the <S%H1964>temple.<s%>

<S%H9633>Seraphim<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%> Him, <S%H259>each<s%> having <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3671>wings;<s%> with <S%H8147>two<s%> he <S%H3680>covered<s%> his <S%H6440>face,<s%> and with <S%H8147>two<s%> he <S%H3680>covered<s%> his <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and with <S%H8147>two<s%> he <S%H5774>flew.<s%>

And <S%H2088>one<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> out to <S%H2088>another<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6918>"Holy,<s%> <S%H6918>Holy,<s%> <S%H6918>Holy,<s%> is the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> The <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H4393>full<s%> of His <S%H9202>glory.<s%>"

And the <S%H9020>foundations<s%> of the <S%H5592>thresholds<s%> <S%H5128>trembled<s%> at the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of him who <S%H7121>called<s%> out, while the <S%H1004>temple<s%> was <S%H4390>filling<s%> with <S%H6227>smoke.<s%>

Then I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H188>"Woe<s%> is me, for I am <S%H1820>ruined!<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> I am a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H8193>lips,<s%> And I <S%H3427>live<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> a <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H8193>lips;<s%> For my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H4428>King,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>"

Then <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H9633>seraphim<s%> <S%H5774>flew<s%> to me, with a <S%H9574>burning<s%> <S%H9574>coal<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%> which he had <S%H3947>taken<s%> from the <S%H4196>altar<s%> with <S%H4457>tongs.<s%>

And he <S%H5060>touched<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> [with it] and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> has <S%H5060>touched<s%> your <S%H8193>lips;<s%> and your <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> is <S%H5493>taken<s%> <S%H5493>away,<s%> and your <S%H9128>sin<s%> is <S%H3722>forgiven.<s%>"

Then I <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4310>"Whom<s%> shall I <S%H7971>send,<s%> and <S%H4310>who<s%> will <S%H1980>go<s%> for Us?" Then I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>"Here<s%> am I. <S%H7971>Send<s%> me!"

And He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1980>"Go,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people:<s%> <S%H8085>'Keep<s%> on <S%H8085>listening,<s%> but do not <S%H995>perceive;<s%> <S%H7200>Keep<s%> on <S%H7200>looking,<s%> but do not <S%H3045>understand.<s%>'

<S%H8080>"Render<s%> the <S%H3820>hearts<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8080>insensitive,<s%> Their <S%H241>ears<s%> <S%H3513>dull,<s%> And their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H9619>dim,<s%> <S%H6435>Lest<s%> they <S%H7200>see<s%> with their <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> <S%H8085>Hear<s%> with their <S%H241>ears,<s%> <S%H995>Understand<s%> with their <S%H3824>hearts,<s%> And <S%H7725>return<s%> and be <S%H7495>healed.<s%>"

Then I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H136>"Lord,<s%> <S%H4970>how<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> <S%H4970><s%>?" And He <S%H559>answered,<s%> <S%H5704>"Until<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> are <S%H7582>devastated<s%> [and] <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H3427>inhabitant,<s%> <S%H1004>Houses<s%> are <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H120>people,<s%> And the <S%H127>land<s%> is <S%H8077>utterly<s%> <S%H8077>desolate,<s%>

"The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H7368>removed<s%> <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> away, And the <S%H5805>forsaken<s%> <S%H5805>places<s%> are <S%H7231>many<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>

<S%H5750>"Yet<s%> there will be a <S%H6224>tenth<s%> <S%H6224>portion<s%> in it, And it will <S%H7725>again<s%> be [subject] to <S%H1197>burning,<s%> Like a <S%H424>terebinth<s%> or an <S%H437>oak<s%> <S%H834>Whose<s%> <S%H4676>stump<s%> remains <S%H834>when<s%> it is <S%H7995>felled.<s%> The <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> is its <S%H4676>stump.<s%>"
